price: Nokorε sε, wo Wura Nyankopͻn, Ͻno na Ɔbεboa wͻn (nyinaa) ano (wͻ Atemmuda). Nokorε sε, Ɔne Onyansafoͻ, Ɔne Onimdefoͻ.
arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحۡشُرُهُمۡۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-inna rabbaka huwa yaḥshuruhum innahu ḥakīmun ʿalīmun
